attributes.action: Force all MPs to resign who oppose Brexit & stand in the way of the UK leaving
attributes.background: In 2016 the people of the UK voted to leave the EU, regardless of how close the vote was the decision was made. As elected people to represent the people of the UK MP’s who are standing in the way of Brexit are betraying the public voice and are therefore no longer fit to hold their positions

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MP's from office because of their views or opinions.
